TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessDataSource extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource

summary.span: 表示与数据绑定控件结合使用的 Microsoft Access 数据库。

span.span: Represents a Microsoft Access database for use with data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是适用于 Microsoft Access 数据库的数据源控件。The class is a data source control that works with Microsoft Access databases. 如其基类即、控件使用 SQL 查询来执行数据检索。Like its base class, , the control uses SQL queries to perform data retrieval. 唯一特征之一控件是你未设置属性。One of the unique characteristics of the control is that you do not set the property. 你需要做设置中的访问 (.mdb) 文件的位置属性和负责基础连接到数据库。All you need to do is set the location of the Access (.mdb) file in the property and the takes care of the underlying connection to the database. 你应将 Access 数据库放置在网站的 App_Data 目录，引用这些相对路径 (例如， `~/App_Data/Northwind.mdb`)。You should place Access databases in the App_Data directory of the Web site and reference them by a relative path (for example, `~/App_Data/Northwind.mdb`). 此位置提供额外安全数据文件，因为它们不提供如果他们请求直接由客户端 Web 浏览器。This location offers additional security for data files, because they are not served if they are requested directly by the client Web browser. 类不支持连接到 Access 数据库受用户名或密码，因为您无法设置属性。The class does not support connecting to Access databases that are protected by a user name or password, because you cannot set the property. 如果你的 Access 数据库受到用户名或密码，使用控件连接到它，以便你可以指定完整连接字符串。If your Access database is protected by a user name or password, use the control to connect to it so that you can specify a complete connection string. 将绑定到的数据绑定控件使用`DataSourceID`数据绑定控件属性。You bind data-bound controls to an using the `DataSourceID` property of the data-bound control. 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[数据源控件绑定到数据使用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7)。For more information about binding a data-bound control to data source controls, see [Binding to Data Using a Data Source Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7). 因为控件处于特定于只有一个数据库产品时，它始终使用相同的提供程序- .NET 数据提供程序。Because the control is specific to only one database product, it always uses the same provider—the .NET data provider. 为此，属性是只读的。For this reason, the property is read-only. 使用时提供程序，参数化 SQL 语句中的参数的顺序非常重要; 任何参数化 SQL 查询中指定， ， ，和属性必须匹配的任何顺序相应的参数集合中的对象。When using the provider, the order of the parameters in a parameterized SQL statement is significant; any parameterized SQL queries that you specify in the , , , and properties must match the order of any objects that are in the corresponding parameter collection. 如果没有任何参数集合指定上，提供给这些操作的参数的顺序必须与它们在基础的 SQL 语句中出现的顺序匹配。If no parameter collection is specified on the , the order of parameters that are supplied to these operations must match the order in which they appear in the underlying SQL statement. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 控件支持其基本类支持的同一缓存行为。The control supports the same caching behavior that its base class supports. 使用缓存可以提高性能的页使用控件。Use caching to increase the performance of pages that use the control. 有关数据源缓存的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据使用数据源控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f534a06-3136-4048-bb2e-6563a8238d15)。For more information about data source caching, see [Caching Data Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f534a06-3136-4048-bb2e-6563a8238d15). 下表介绍的功能控件。The following table describes the features of the control. |功能Capability|惠?Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |排序Sorting|设置属性值。Set the property to the value.| |筛选Filtering|设置属性用来筛选数据的筛选表达式时调用方法。Set the property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the method is called.| |分页Paging|不支持的 Access 数据库的直接分页操作。The does not support direct paging operations on an Access database. 数据绑定控件，如，可以通过返回的项页，如果属性设置为值。A data-bound control, such as the , can page over the items returned by the , if the property is set to the value.| |UpdatingUpdating|设置属性用来更新数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to a SQL statement used to update data. 此语句通常参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |DeletingDeleting|设置属性用来删除数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to a SQL statement used to delete data. 此语句通常参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |插入Inserting|设置属性用来插入数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to a SQL statement used to insert data. 此语句通常参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |缓存Caching|设置属性值，属性`true`，和和根据缓存数据所需的缓存行为的属性。Set the property to the value, the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| 与所有数据源控件，控件所关联的强类型的数据源视图类。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a strongly typed data source view class. 就像控件扩展控件，类扩展类。Just as the control extends the control, the class extends the class. 类重写几个方法以使用.NET 数据提供程序。The class overrides a few of the methods to use the .NET data provider. 没有没有可视化呈现控件; 它实现为控件可启用声明性持久性以及 （可选） 允许参与状态管理。There is no visual rendering of the control; it is implemented as a control to enable declarative persistence and to permit, optionally, participation in state management. 因此，无法设置属性，如支持 visual 功能，例如和属性。As a result, you cannot set properties that support visual features, such as the and properties. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示常见的显示和更新方案中的使用控件。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the control. 属性设置为相应的 SQL 查询，并从 Northwind 数据库的数据显示在控件。The property is set to an appropriate SQL query, and data from the Northwind database is displayed in the control. 因为还指定属性和属性设置为`true`，你可以编辑和任何其他代码使用更新记录。Because a property is also specified and the property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code. 控制句柄添加到参数集合;控件将参数值传递对象首先，通过指定字段的值后跟属性。The control handles adding parameters to the collection; the control passes the parameter values for the objects first, followed by the values of fields that are specified by the property. 调用方法自动。The calls the method automatically. 如果你想要显式排序参数，，指定集合。If you want to order the parameters, explicitly, specify an collection on the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access/CS/access5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access/VB/access5vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The location can be relative to the current Web form's folder, an absolute physical path, or a virtual path.

span.span: The SQL query used to retrieve data from the Access database.

[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_7access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_7access/CS/access7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_7access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_7access/VB/access7vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取用来连接到 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串。

span.span: Gets the connection string that is used to connect to the Microsoft Access database.

value.span: 通过 .NET 数据提供程序，用于连接到 Access 数据库的 控件的 OLE DB 连接字符串。

span.span: The OLE DB connection string that the control uses to connect to an Access database, through the .NET data provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可仅与.NET 数据提供程序和连接字符串使用是特定于此提供程序。The control can be used only with the .NET data provider, and the connection string that uses is specific to this provider. 因此，控件可公开连接字符串设置，如属性，作为属性和连接字符串在运行时使用的值的构造属性，如果设置。Therefore, the control exposes connection string settings, such as the property, as a property and constructs a connection string at run time using the values of the property, if set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示属性ASP.NET 网页中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display the property of the control in an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access/CS/access24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access/VB/access24vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 Microsoft Access .mdb 文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the Microsoft Access .mdb file.
The location of the Access .mdb file.

value.span: 支持绝对路径、相对路径和虚拟路径。

span.span: Absolute, relative, and virtual paths are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是虚拟的绝对，或 UNC 目录路径访问.mdb 文件控件表示。The property is a virtual, absolute, or UNC directory path to the Access .mdb file that the control represents. 如果只输入文件的名称，这表示的.mdb 文件位于当前正在执行的 Web 窗体页或代码所在的目录。If only the name of the file is entered, this indicates that the .mdb file is found in the same directory as the currently executing Web Forms page or code. 支持使用向前和向后斜杠的相对路径。Relative paths with both forward and backward slashes are supported. 例如，`"./test/test/Northwind.mdb"`映射到相同的路径`".\test\test\Northwind.mdb"`和`"test/test/Northwind.mdb"`。For example, `"./test/test/Northwind.mdb"` maps to the same path as `".\test\test\Northwind.mdb"` and `"test/test/Northwind.mdb"`. UNC 路径，如`"\\mymachine\somedatadirectory\Northwind.mdb"`，也支持。UNC paths, such as `"\\mymachine\somedatadirectory\Northwind.mdb"`, are also supported. 尽管支持绝对物理路径，应避免使用它们，因为它们可以增加部署的复杂性。Although absolute physical paths are supported, you should avoid using them because they can complicate deployment. ## 配置访问数据库的权限Configuring Permissions for an Access Database 使用 Access.mdb 文件的一个重要方面是正确配置的权限。An important aspect of working with an Access .mdb file is to configure permissions properly. 当 Web 应用程序使用 Access 数据库时，应用程序必须具有读取权限的.mdb 文件，以便它可以访问数据。When a Web application uses an Access database, the application must have Read permission to the .mdb file so that it can access the data. 此外，应用程序必须具有对包含的.mdb 文件的文件夹的写入权限。In addition, the application must have Write permission to the folder containing the .mdb file. 编写权限是必需的因为访问将创建一个额外的文件具有扩展名.ldb 还可在其中保留有关并发用户的数据库锁的信息。Write permission is required because Access creates an additional file with the extension .ldb in which it maintains information about database locks for concurrent users. 在运行时创建.ldb 文件。The .ldb file is created at run time. 默认情况下，ASP.NET Web 应用程序运行一个名为 ASPNET （用于 Microsoft Windows 2000 和 Microsoft Windows XP），本地计算机帐户的上下文中或网络服务帐户 （用于 Microsoft Windows Server 2003) 的上下文中。By default, ASP.NET Web applications run in the context of a local machine account called ASPNET (for Microsoft Windows 2000 and Microsoft Windows XP), or in the context of the NETWORK SERVICE account (for Microsoft Windows Server 2003). 例如，对于 Windows 2000 或 Windows XP，如果 Web 服务器名为 MyServer，MyServer 计算机上的 ASP.NET 应用程序上下文中运行的本地帐户 MyServer\ASPNET。For example, for Windows 2000 or Windows XP, if the Web server is named MyServer, ASP.NET applications on the MyServer computer run in the context of the local account MyServer\ASPNET. 因此，若要在 ASP.NET Web 应用程序中使用 Access 数据库，必须配置包含 Access 数据库具有读取和写入权限的文件夹。Therefore, to use an Access database in an ASP.NET Web application, you must configure the folder containing the Access database to have both Read and Write permissions. 当你在 Microsoft Visual Web Developer Web 开发工具中创建网站时，Visual Web Developer 将创建一个当前的根文件夹下名为 App_Data 文件夹。When you create a Web site in the Microsoft Visual Web Developer Web development tool, Visual Web Developer creates a folder named App_Data below the current root folder. 文件夹被旨在作为应用程序数据，包括访问数据库的存储区。The folder is designed to be a store for application data, including Access databases. ASP.NET 还使用 App_Data 文件夹来存储系统维护，例如成员资格和角色的数据库的数据库。The App_Data folder is also used by ASP.NET to store databases that the system maintains, such as the database for membership and roles. 当 Visual Web Developer 创建 App_Data 文件夹时，它会授予到 ASPNET 或 NETWORK SERVICE 用户帐户的文件夹的读取和写入权限。When Visual Web Developer creates the App_Data folder, it grants Read and Write permissions for the folder to the ASPNET or NETWORK SERVICE user account. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种安全措施，Visual Web Developer 还配置 App_Data 文件夹以便，不由 Web 服务器提供的文件夹中的文件。As a security measure, Visual Web Developer also configures the App_Data folder so that files in the folder are not served by the Web server. 不要在 App_Data 文件夹中存储任何 Web 页面，因为如果它们在该文件夹中请求了一个页面，用户将看到一个错误。Do not store any Web pages in the App_Data folder, because users will see an error if they request a page from that folder. ## Examples 本部分包含三个代码示例。This section contains three code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置驻留在与 Web 窗体页位于同一目录中的 Northwind.mdb 文件的属性。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property to a Northwind.mdb file that resides in the same directory as the Web Forms page. 第二个代码示例演示如何设置到驻留在目录中的 Northwind.mdb 文件的虚拟路径的属性名为数据库，这是在 Web 窗体页处于该目录下。The second code example demonstrates how to set the property to the virtual path of a Northwind.mdb file that resides in a directory named Database, which is beneath the directory that the Web Forms page is in. 第三个代码示例演示如何设置到 UNC 共享上可用的 Northwind.mdb 文件的 UNC 路径的属性。The third code example demonstrates how to set the property to a UNC path of a Northwind.mdb file that is available on a UNC share. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置驻留在与 Web 窗体页位于同一目录中的 Northwind.mdb 文件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a Northwind.mdb file that resides in the same directory as the Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access/CS/access4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access/VB/access4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置到驻留在目录中的 Northwind.mdb 文件的虚拟路径的属性名为数据库，这是在 Web 窗体页处于该目录下。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to the virtual path of a Northwind.mdb file that resides in a directory named Database, which is beneath the directory that the Web Forms page is in. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access/CS/access23cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access/VB/access23vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置到 UNC 共享上可用的 Northwind.mdb 文件的 UNC 路径的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a UNC path of a Northwind.mdb file that is available on a UNC share. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access/CS/access22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access/VB/access22vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An invalid path was given.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然控件公开属性因为它从其基类继承，正在尝试设置属性将导致异常。While the control exposes the property because it is inherited from its base class, attempting to set the property results in a exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示属性Web 窗体页中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display the property of the control in a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access/CS/access25cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access/VB/access25vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The property overrides the property.
Throws a , in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基的类中， 、属性获取或设置指示哪些数据库和表用于 Microsoft SQL Server 缓存依赖项的以分号分隔字符串。In the base class, , the property gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency. 缓存依赖项不支持由 Microsoft Access 和任何访问属性将导致异常。Cache dependency is not supported by Microsoft Access, and any access to the property results in a exception.

exception.span: 已尝试获取或设置 属性。

span.span: An attempt was made to get or set the property.
